datoCmsKey.name: Glori Dei FIlippone
datoCmsKey.danceExperience: Jazz, lyrical, ballet, tap, musical theatre, stage combat
datoCmsKey.bio: Originally from Iowa, I graduated from NYU Tisch where I studied acting and musical theatre. I have a passion for stage combat/ fight choreography, and worked as a Stunt PA on Avengers: Infinity War. I have a large background in movement and dance, and I ADORE all things strange and unusual. My Instagram is @gloridei22 if you want to be friends!
